summary: This bill, the Ensuring Access to Specialty care Everywhere Act of 2025 (EASE Act of 2025), aims to improve access to specialty healthcare services for Medicare and Medicaid beneficiaries. It directs the Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation to test a model utilizing digital modalities like telehealth, in coordination with primary care providers. The model involves agreements with selected provider networks, focusing on rural and underserved areas. The bill outlines the criteria for provider network selection and defines eligible individuals.
